definitions.text: a stop consonant made by the suction of air into the mouth (as in Bantu)
a hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move a wheel forward or prevent it from moving backward
depression of a button on a computer mouse
examples: a click on the right button for example

definitions.text: move or strike with a noise
make a clicking or ticking sound
cause to make a snapping sound
make a clucking sounds, characteristic of hens
become clear or enter one's consciousness or emotions
examples: It dawned on him that she had betrayed him
